p: EV71 stock (1 L at 2 × 10 8 TCID 50/ml) was concentrated by ultracentrifugation at 26 000 rpm in a SW28Ti rotor (Beckman Coulter, Brea, CA, USA) for 2 h at 4°C. Viral RNA was extracted using an RNeasy mini kit (QIAGEN, Venlo, The Netherlands). UHPLC-MS/MS analysis was performed on an Agilent 1290 UHPLC system coupled with an ESI-triple quadrupole mass spectrometer (G6410B or G6495, Agilent Technologies, Santa Clara, CA, USA) according to previously published instructions ( 47).
